member.summary: Divides a Document into a list of new Documents.

example.title: Example
example.description: This example demonstrates how to split a Document named "MyDocument.docx" into multiple Documents. The original Document will be split based on its various sections & the resulting Documents will be saved to disk with a numbered suffix.

remarks.para: Once split, the content of the original Document will be divided into the newly created Documents.
